summary: The Servicemember Healthcare Freedom Act of 2025 aims to allow members of the Selected Reserve and National Guard, who also work for the federal government and are eligible for Federal Employee Health Benefits (FEHB), the choice to enroll in the TRICARE Reserve Select (TRS) healthcare plan. The bill acknowledges existing benefits and aims to provide continuity of care. It modifies the expiration date to allow enrollment in TRS starting January 1, 2026.
